events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your online store, but I would like to request a refund because the size does not fit me properly and the fit is not as described.
The customer's message contains a refund request due to sizing issue, so the case is assigned to the Refund cluster.
The case has been routed to agent Sarah M., who specializes in handling refund requests for apparel items.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I understand you want to request a refund due to sizing issues. Iâ€™m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or if the tags are still attached? This will help us process your refund quickly.
My order number is 987654321, and the jacket is brand new with tags still intact. I have not worn it at all and would like to initiate the return process.

Thank you for that information. We have approved your refund request. Please ship the jacket back to the address in the return form we will email you shortly, and once received, your payment will be refunded within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the clear instructions and will send the jacket back immediately using the return form you send.
Glad I could assist you. Your refund case is now resolved from our side. Once we receive the returned jacket, we will process the refund promptly.
Hello! We wanted to check in and ensure you received the return shipping label and that the jacket was shipped back successfully. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Yes, I have shipped the jacket back yesterday using the label you sent. Thank you for following up.
We have confirmed receipt of the returned jacket and your refund has been successfully processed. You should see the amount back in your account shortly.
This case is now officially closed. Please reach out if you require any further assistance in the future. Thank you for your business.
